translate('#LDS#Display properties with empty values in overview pages')
translate("#LDS#Object search for partial strings contained within the data")
ConfigParam.LongDescription: translate("#LDS#Use this property to select whether the SqlSearch function will return matches where the search string is found at any index in the data string.")

ConfigParam.Description: translate('#LDS#Only one menu can be expanded at the same time.')
translate("#LDS#Globally disable all grid list views")

ConfigParam.LongDescription: translate("#LDS#Specify the format in which dates must be entered. You can use predefined values or specify custom formats. For more information see https://docs.telerik.com/kendo-ui/framework/globalization/dateformatting.")

translate("#LDS#Specify the format in which times must be entered. You can use predefined values or specify custom formats. For more information see https://docs.telerik.com/kendo-ui/framework/globalization/dateformatting.")

translate("#LDS#Specify the format in which dates and times must be entered. You can use predefined values or specify custom formats. For more information see https://docs.telerik.com/kendo-ui/framework/globalization/dateformatting.")

ConfigParam.Description: translate("#LDS#Multi-factor authentication is required after login")
ConfigParam.LongDescription: translate("#LDS#Specify whether you want to generally enable multi-factor authentication. Before you can use certain multi-factor authentication methods, you must activate this parameter.")

ConfigParam.Description: translate("#LDS#Filter condition for identities who require multi-factor authentication")

Function.Name: listselect(object tablename, bound(tablename) string columnname)
Function.Expression: isnullorempty( concat( select distinct "'"+columnname+"'" from tablename, ', ' ), "''")

Function.Name: listselect(object tablename, bound(tablename) string columnname, bound(tablename) bool whereclause)
Function.Expression: isnullorempty( concat( select distinct "'"+columnname+"'" from tablename where whereclause, ', ' ), "''")

Function.Name: listselect(object tablename, bound(tablename) string columnname, bound(tablename) bool whereclause, string delimiter)
Function.Expression: isnullorempty( concat( select distinct delimiter+columnname+delimiter from tablename where whereclause, ', ' ), (delimiter+delimiter))

Function.Name: listselect(object tablename, bound(tablename) string columnname, bound(tablename) bool whereclause, string delimiter, string seperator)
Function.Expression: isnullorempty( concat( select distinct delimiter+columnname+delimiter from tablename where whereclause, seperator ), (delimiter+delimiter) )

InsertValue.Value: translate("#LDS#Processes have finished. Click to see the results.")
